actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to define the term "marketing history" for purposes of the milk production termination program to be carried out under such Act, to require the Secretary to issue rules to carry out such program, and to provide for a new period during which producers may submit bids to participate in such program.

summary.text: Milk Production Termination Amendments of 1986 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to establish a 30-day period for producers to apply for the milk production termination program. Defines "marketing history" for purposes of such program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to define the term "marketing history" for purposes of the milk production termination program to be carried out under such Act, to require the Secretary to issue rules to carry out such program, and to provide for a new period during which producers may submit bids to participate in such program.
